feed.title: Khayo Maina
feed.subtitle: Hello! I’m Khayo Maina, a passionate backend developer with a knack for creating efficient, scalable, and secure applications. This portfolio showcases my journey, skills, and the projects I’ve worked on, including Twakula and beyond.
